Description: Turquoise glazed composition figure of Taweret, standing and wearing wig and horned plumed, details are incised and picked out in black, loop for suspension behind the headdress, one breast has been drilled.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013 May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Acquisition name: Purchased from: H E E T Rogers
Acquisition notes: The object is recorded as being 'purchased while in Cairo'.
